Name: Avalo Legends
About the game: The greatest tournament in the galaxy opens its doors once more. Avalo, located in the distant galaxy of Ishka, is a frantic melee match that takes place in Khot, the capital of the galaxy and a technologically advanced city with a unique coliseum in the world. Each of the champions available have a specific skill, adding a strategic component to the game. Embody one of the characters that have reached the tournament finals, discover its skills and participate in two different game modes: Arena: Focused on combats between players, where fighting against your opponents is the only way to reach victory. Domain: Where the objective is to capture a series of control points spread across the stage. In short, Avalo Legends is a first person melee (FPM) multiplayer game for PC and for 2 to 4 players on split screen. The game showcases graphical prowess as well as a good visual polish, and has been developed with Unreal Engine. Avalo Legends is a student showcase project from ESAT Valencia.
